item.title: [Python] Understand Python for Pepper development. -Introduction to Python Box-
item.description: #Foreword Knowledge of Python can be said to be essential for developing Pepper and NAO. So, briefly, I would like to explain the Python box in Naoqi. #Development environment Model name: MacBook Pro OS: Yosemite 10.10.3 Processor name: Intel Core i5 2.6 GHz Memory: 16 GB Graphics: Intel Iris 1536MB Choreographe: 2.3.1 Main subject ##Python box What is a Python box? First, I would like to briefly explain about the Python box.
